mysite
Table of Contents

Namespace SzeneGenerator

Classes

BiomeMapGenerator

Generates biome distribution maps used for terrain texturing and object spawning. Supports simple splits and height/slope-based procedural biome assignment.

BiomeOverride
CameraSettings
CameraTargetPreset
GlobalSkyManager

Manages global sky, atmosphere, fog, and weather effects such as rain and snow. Follows the camera position and applies region-specific sky presets and weather profiles.

GlobalSkySettings
HeightBand
HeightMapCreator

Creates procedural heightmaps and control maps for Terrain3D, applying noise, terrain rules, biome blending, and slope-based layer selection.

LocalSkySettings
ObjectSpawner

Places environment objects and targets into the scene based on biome, height, slope, and distance rules defined in region configuration. Returns all spawned objects marked as targets.

PrefabEntry
RegionAssetSet

Region-specific asset container used to build a scene. Holds Terrain3D texture slots and prefab mappings referenced by region JSON rules.

RegionRules

Region-specific rules loaded from JSON controlling terrain layers, spawning behavior, and local sky settings.

RegionRulesLoader
SimpleCamera

Free-fly camera with preset views and procedural spawn logic. Can position itself relative to targets while keeping them inside the view frustum.

SimpleNoiseGenerator

Lightweight noise-based heightmap generator producing normalized values (0..1).

SlopeOverride
SpawnEntry
SpawningRules
TargetCoordinateExporter

Exports spawned target objects (including metadata like asset_id) to a JSON file.

TerrainAssetManager

Creates and applies Terrain3D asset resources (textures) from a RegionAssetSet.

TerrainManager

Generates terrain geometry, applies heightmaps and biome texturing, and spawns environment objects based on region configuration. Provides terrain height sampling and target spawn data for camera placement.

TerrainRules
TerrainSettings
TerrainSlotEntry
WorldManager

Central coordinator responsible for building the procedural world. Initializes sky, terrain, spawning, camera placement, and triggers screenshot and metadata export.

WorldSettings

Root configuration container for terrain, sky, and camera settings.

Delegates

TerrainManager.TargetsReadyEventHandler
